rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entry with a reception area, built to incorporate Vastu principles by aligning the entrance with the direction of wealth and prosperity (southeast).

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living space that features Mediterranean design elements such as warm tones, decorative tiles, and arches. The layout is designed to ensure ample natural light and a view of the terrace.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Located in the north-west zone per Vastu recommendations, ensuring calmness and privacy. It features an ensuite bathroom for convenience.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A versatile space that can serve as a guest room or office. Placed adjacent to the living area for easy access while maintaining a sense of privacy.

rooms.name: Kitchen and Dining Nook
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchen with modern Mediterranean fixtures. The dining nook is integrated into the same space, aligning with local norms for efficient use of space.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The main door is positioned facing the east to welcome positive energy as per Vastu guidelines while respecting cultural aesthetics. A shaded porch provides a transition from outdoors to indoors.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: An opening that leads directly to the rooftop terrace, enhancing the flow between indoor and outdoor spaces in line with Mediterranean open designs.
